Welcome to our chain Home Kitchen,Papa's Pizza. We are pleased to get you on our Home Kitchen,Papa's Pizza mobile app. First, take regards from the deepest space of our heart.Then read and find what are our thoughts and deeds. Once you finish reading this message you would have been able to understood what are really meant to inspiring tasty,hot foods together with smart home delivery.


We observed that the foods that are readily aviable in our market lack suitability for good health. To think of our people's health, we proceeded to provide a range of menus for Lunch, dinner, celebrations and different festivals as relevant to our Mission "Chain Home Kitchen with clean, nurient and healthy dishes" and Vision "Around and across Bangladesh", which, we think, contributes to supporting a healthy living in our society.
Selecting and collecting pure,healthy ingredients from our local and national markets, we prepare menu through a clean, healthy process.

 Italian, USA, Mexican, Arabian,Indian and other popular dishes will be served in our different districts gradually. However, at the very beginning now, we serve a limited number of dishes only now at Naogaon Sadar, Naogaon District But it is for the time being and you should not be frustrated. Very soo we will be present to cover more dishes at more districts. This opening moments will be available Italian and Spanish Pizza, Mexican Burger and Indian dishes.


Our business philosophy is to analyze criticality between human thursts and food factors and find unfulfilled needs and wants in demands and serve nutrient,tasty and healthy foods that help have huge energy for good living in every day life. we hope customers will provide us with assistance to continue our improvement and the vise-versa.
we believe you can truly enjoy your life with our everyday dishes.


Authority, Papa's Pizza
